citation.article-title: Alicyclobacillus pomorum sp. nov., a novel thermo-acidophilic, endospore-forming bacterium that does not possess omega-alicyclic fatty acids, and emended description of the genus Alicyclobacillus.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of genus AlicyclobacillusWisotzkey et al. 1992
The description of the genus Alicyclobacillus (Wisotzkey et al., 1992) is emended to reflect the following chemotaxonomic characteristic.

The cellular fatty acids profile consists of ω-alicyclic fatty acids and a small amount of straight- and branched-chain saturated fatty acids or only straight- and branched-chain saturated fatty acids instead of ω-alicyclic fatty acids.
